name: cpa-web-app-project
description: A web application that helps CPA candidates score highly on the IT portion of the BEC exam.

scripts.dev: npm run cleanup && mkdir dist && cp src/assets/questions.json dist && parcel src/app/index.html src/app/dashboard/*.html src/app/testPages/*.html src/app/homepage/*.html
scripts.build: npm run cleanup && mkdir dist && cp src/assets/questions.json dist && parcel build src/app/index.html src/app/dashboard/*.html src/app/testPages/*.html src/app/homepage/*.html --public-url ./
scripts.deploy: npm run build && git add --all && git commit -m'Deploy' && git push && git subtree push --prefix dist origin gh-pages
